sources.title: Latest imported feed items on ArmchairCelts

articles.description: I am a proud European, no matter what queue I have to stand in at the airport. I voted Remain. I will vote Yes in the future independence referendum in the hope that we are returned to the EU. I have loved the EU since I visited Germany for a trade union conference when I […]
articles.title: Brexit Has Changed Celtic’s Transfer Focus … And Very Much For The Better.

articles.description:
Mickey Johnston has been at Celtic since 2008, rising through the ranks to the first team. He’s failed to consistently impress fans, with injuries constantly sidelining the winger. He’s shown glimpses of being a good player, he’s got pace and doesn’t mind doing a few tricks here and there. Being a winger is one of […]
Source
articles.title: Last Chance Saloon for Celtic Star

articles.description:
Celtic are reportedly not looking at Swedish striker Jordan Larsson as an option during this summer’s transfer window. The 25-year-old was recently released by Russian side Spartak Moscow and is currently on the lookout for a new club. Of course, the news of Larsson being available on a free transfer brought a lot of fanfare ...
The post Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed

articles.description:
Celtic had received contact from Jordan Larsson’s agents. However, despite his interest in the club, the player has made a u-turn deciding he would not wish to join the Scottish champions. Celtic could’ve picked up the player for free after he terminated his contract in Russia, but after news of his potential signing went quiet, […]
Source
articles.title: Jordan Larsson to Celtic Not Happening – Report

articles.description:
The first few weeks of the transfer window have been an extremely exciting time for the Celtic support. Ange Postecoglou got to work early, bringing four new permanent additions to his squad ahead of the 2021/22 campaign. Both Cameron Carter-Vickers and Jota made their returns after an excellent loan spell, whilst Ben Siegrist and Alexandro ...
The post The patient stance that Celtic supporters will need to take at this stage of the transfer window appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: The patient stance that Celtic supporters will need to take at this stage of the transfer window

articles.description:
Scott Brown has won the first game of his managerial career in his first attempt. The former Celtic captain was appointed as the boss of Fleetwood Town a month back but had to wait until pre-season before he could sit in the dugouts. He’s already made his mark, bringing players from north of the border […]
Source
articles.title: Scott Brown Starts Managerial Career with a Win

articles.description:
Pre-season camps are a time for players to come together as a group and Hoops winger Mikey Johnston has revealed what has been keeping the Hoops side gripped.  At Celtic’s base there is a special entertainment room where players and staff can gather to unwind and relax. This room includes a large screen which players […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic Squad’s ‘Guilty Pleasure’ Revealed; Ange Doesn’t Approve

articles.description:
It has been a difficult six months for Celtic midfielder Yosuke Ideguchi. The Japanese internationalist arrived at Parkhead in last January’s transfer window, alongside fellow countrymen Reo Hatate and Daizen Maeda. Whilst both Hatate and Maeda went on to play a big role in the Hoops title push, Ideguchi was only able to make a ...
The post The signs that could suggest Ange is looking to use January signing in different Celtic role appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: The signs that could suggest Ange is looking to use January signing in different Celtic role

articles.description: This time last year, the idea that Tony Ralston was on the brink of a fantastic campaign, European games, international recognition and a newfound respect from every Celtic fan would have been greeted by most people with bitter laughter. Ralston was miles off it. He was a player most of the support had almost completely […]
articles.title: Mikey Johnston Is The Celtic Player With Everything To Prove This Season.

articles.description:
Legia Warsaw appear to be desperately struggling to sell tickets for Artur Boruc’s final match after pricing controversy.  It looks like the Polish club are trying to cash in on the goalkeeping hero’s final game as this morning the club has released a special collection of clothes and accessories dedicated to the match. The match […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic Summer Fixture Turning into Farce

articles.description:
It has been an enjoyable last seven days for Celtic fans after the Bhoys’ pre-season preparations began to ramp up. The entire squad returned to pre-season this time last week and travelled to Austria to take part in a 10-day pre-season training camp. So far, the Hoops have also taken part in two entertaining friendly ...
The post Celtic supporters are preparing for another exciting seven days as Paradise awaits appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic supporters are preparing for another exciting seven days as Paradise awaits

articles.description: Some folk seem to be worried about our weekend. Others, like Keith Jackson, are reading into it what they want to, with one eye ever fixed on pleasing Ibrox. I have no such concerns, and I think that the Record trying to poke holes in Celtic’s system is nothing new and nothing to be worried […]
articles.title: Why No-One At Celtic Will Be Panicking Over Rapid’s Three Goals At The Weekend.

articles.description:
Celtic winger James Forrest has insisted he is just staying at Parkhead for the sake of it after signing a new three-year deal with the club. The 31-year-old came through the club’s academy and made his debut back in 2010 against Motherwell, scoring on his first appearance for the Hoops. Since his debut over 12 ...
The post Celtic star sends determined pre-season message appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic star sends determined pre-season message

articles.description: It’s probably unwise to read too much into the performances or results of pre-season friendly encounters, but Celtic’s entertaining and fiercely competitive 3-3 draw with Rapid Vienna encapsulated Celtic’s current state of affairs both defensively and offensively. From middle to front Celtic looked a side capable of going to-to-toe with both domestic and European rivals Read More
articles.title: Celtic’s lack of depth in defence showed just how threadbare we are

articles.description: CELTIC loan flop Charly Musonda has moved to try to clear up his mysterious vanishing act only days after apparently agreeing a deal with Belgian club Zulte Waregem. The 25-year-old one-time wonder boy, who saw an 18-month switch to Parkhead cut short by a year as he was returned to Chelsea in 2018, has been [...]
articles.title: CELTIC MISFIT CLEARS UP MYSTERY
